title: Log a Received Shipment
description: A receiving clerk needs to log an incoming shipment of components from a supplier.

tasks.description: Scan the packing slip to retrieve the corresponding purchase order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent scans the document and the system displays the correct PO.

tasks.description: Count the received items and check for any damage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Clerk physically counts the items and visually inspects them.

tasks.description: Record the received quantity against the purchase order, noting a partial shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enters the received quantity, and the PO status is updated to 'Partially Received'.
